Description: No Reserve Price listing. Your bid is final. The Case Big size authentic Rolex Oyster case of reference 1501. Durable stainless steel body with yellow gold fluted bezel and screw-in caseback. Includes 'Bombe' style lugs and original golden screw-in crown with logo. Measurements are 34.5 mm (1 23/64") in diameter, 41.5 mm (1 41/64") from lug to lug and 11.5 mm (29/64") thick. In excellent condition with subtle signs of some gentle wear. The back is signed inside Montres Rolex S.A., Geneva Switzerland, Patented, Stainless Steel, 1501. Engraved between upper lugs with Registered Design 1501, and between lower lugs with serial number 64042xx. New aftermarket leather strap. Black colored with a crocodile texture, size 18 mm. New aftermarket stainless steel buckle. The Dial Stunning white dial in mint flawless condition. It's 100% original and untouched. Golden luminous stick hands point to black bold Roman numbers. A blued steel central sweep hand marks the seconds. It features a convenient outer minute track in black with golden applied hour markers that are escorted by luminous markers. Easy to read magnified date window at 3. It is signed Rolex Oyster Perpetual Date, Superlative Chronometer Officially Certified, T Swiss T. Raised Rolex crown logo below XII. Acrylic crystal with cyclops magnification over the date box. Excellent condition. The Movement Also original and signed, this automatic movement is powered by a caliber 1570 which was introduced around 1965. It features 26 jewels and shock protection device. Adjusted to five positions and temperature. Non quick-set date. Signed Montres Rolex S.A. Geneva Swiss. According to the Rolex website: “the four words ‘Superlative Chronometer Officially Certified’ engraved on the timepieces dial mean that the movement of this watch has endured 15 days and nights of testing by the COSC (Controle Officiel Suisse des Chronometres) and independent not for profit organization. To receive COSC certification a watch must demonstrate extreme precision in a variety of positions and temperatures- the standard level of quality of every Rolex chronometer”. Title: ORIGINAL ROLEX OYSTER PERPETUAL REF 1501 AUTO DATE CHRONOMETER GOLD SS MEN WATCH
